phrase.cizu_name: the pen is mightier than the sword

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)writing is more effective than military power or violence
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)言语胜于刀剑，笔尖胜过干戈

jx.jx_en_mean: write or begin to write something

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally denoting a feather with a sharpened quill): from Old French penne, from Latin penna 'feather' (in late Latin 'pen')
Old English penn, of unknown origin

encyclopedia.content: 聚萘二甲酸乙二醇酯的简称。

entry.def: A pen is a long thin object which you use to write in ink.
If someone pens a letter, article, or book, they write it.

example.ex: I really intended to pen this letter to you early this morning...
example.tran: 我真的打算今天一大早给你写这封信的。

example.ex: She penned a short memo to his private secretary.
example.tran: 她给他的私人秘书写了一份简短的备忘录。

entry.def: A pen is also a small area with a fence round it in which farm animals are kept for a short time.

example.ex: He wasn't sure exactly how a fox could have got into the sheep's pen.
example.tran: 他不是十分确定狐狸是怎么进入羊圈的。

entry.def: If people or animals are penned somewhere or are penned up, they are forced to remain in a very small area.

example.ex: ...to drive the cattle back to the house so they could be milked and penned for the night...
example.tran: 将牛群赶回家，这样就能挤奶并将其关进牛棚过夜

example.ex: The goats are penned in and fodder has to be cut and carried each day...
example.tran: 山羊被关进圈里，每天都得铡草运料。

entry.def: People sometimes say the pen to refer to a prison.
If you put pen to paper, you write something.

example.ex: Whenever he put pen to paper he was at a loss for the right words to break the news.
example.tran: 他每次一提笔就不知道如何措辞透露这个消息。

means.word_mean: 1. a writing implement with a point from which ink flows
3. a portable enclosure in which babies may be left to play
4. a correctional institution for those convicted of major crimes

Sentence.sentence: Students mark the main ideas and important details with a pen or pencil, yellow or blue or orange.
First, read a chapter with one pen in your hand and others next to you on the desk

In an interview with the Paris Review Hughes speculated that when a person puts pen to paper, "you meet the terrible resistance of what happened your first year at it, when you couldn't write at all".

means.word_mean: 笔; 钢笔; 圆珠笔

sentences.en: There are two pens on the desk.
He must write the letter with a pen.
sentences.cn: 他必须用钢笔写这封信。

sentences.en: Students are required to write their exercises in pen.
sentences.cn: 学生们被要求用钢笔做练习。

sentences.en: George is clever with his pen.
Pen it before you forget it.
I penned a few lines to him.
I penned a few words to father today.
sentences.cn: 今天我给父亲写了一封短信。
牧羊人把他们的羊群关入栏中。

sentences.en: She feels penned by her life as a housewife.
sentences.cn: 她觉得做家庭主妇很受束缚。

jushi.english: I am sorry.I've broken your pen.
jushi.chinese: 对不起,我弄断了你的笔。

jushi.english: You may deposit your pen in the bag.
jushi.chinese: 你可以把笔放在袋子里。
